description:
'''Tom Howard''' (February 23, 1950 â€“ January 29, 2010) was an American [[pianist]], musical [[Arrangement|arranger]], and orchestral [[Conducting|conductor]].

In 1983, Howard helped the rock band [[Daniel Amos]] form the [[Alarma! Records]] label.

On January 29, 2010, Howard suffered a fatal heart attack while hiking with his wife, Dori at [[Edwin Warner Park]] in [[Nashville, Tennessee|Nashville]].
